results.title: MUSIC REVIEW; Coldplay Delivers in the Usual Way

A new study confirms what music fans have long suspected: rock and pop musicians die prematurely more often than the general population.

results.body: Wonder and innocence, gaudiness and cheer: can it be any surprise that the jazz drummer Matt Wilson thrives around the holidays?
